document.full_text: salesforce.com's $326 million purchase of privately held radian6 will allow the cloud-based software maker help its clients track customer trends on social media sites such as facebook and twitter.
document.title: salesforce.com seeks social media edge with radian6 buy
lines_and_colors: salesforce.com's $326 million purchase of privately held radian6 will allow the cloud-based software maker help its clients track customer trends on social media sites such as facebook and twitter.
